con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:hor="http://www.hkjc.org.hk/Schema/CAP/IDARS/HorseProfile_v1" xmlns:com="http://www.hkjc.org.hk/Schema/CAP/Common_v2" xmlns:rac="http://www.hkjc.org.hk/Schema/CAP/IDARS/RaceCommon_v1">\r <soap:Header/>\r <soap:Body>\r <hor:GetHorseByMeetingByRaceRequest>\r <hor:ConsumerHeader>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <com:SessionID>?</com:SessionID>\r <com:ServerID>?</com:ServerID>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <com:ClientIP>?</com:ClientIP>\r <com:EntryPointCode>?</com:EntryPointCode>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <com:ServiceVersion>?</com:ServiceVersion>\r <com:EndOf_v2_0Elm>?</com:EndOf_v2_0Elm>\r <!--You may enter ANY elements at this point-->\r </hor:ConsumerHeader>\r <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->\r <rac:RaceID>?</rac:RaceID>\r <rac:Meeting>\r <rac:Date>?</rac:Date>\r <rac:VenueCode>?</rac:VenueCode>\r </rac:Meeting>\r <rac:RaceNo>?</rac:RaceNo>\r </hor:GetHorseByMeetingByRaceRequest>\r </soap:Body>\r </soap:Envelope>
